Water content was determined in each sample by wet and dry weight difference. Porosity was calculated from water content, assuming that the samples were water-saturated, and using a particle density of 2.6 g cm −3. The mass of particles per square centimeter was calculated from porosity and particle density in each sample and then cumulated to express the vertical depth in sediment cores as cumulative mass depth, eliminating the effect of sediment compaction
44 .
